snippet: The Stanley Cup is the most singular of trophies, a 35-pound hunk of silver recognizable instantly even by those who do not watch a second of the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: The Stanley Cup is the most singular of trophies, a 35-pound hunk of silver recognizable instantly even by those who do not watch a second of the playoffs.

headline.main: When the Trophy Is the Biggest Star
headline.print_headline: When the Trophy Is the Biggest Star
